Krisna Gupta {#title}

### PhD Candidate in Economics at The Australian National University (ANU)

At Crawford School of Public policy under supervision of [Arianto Patunru](https://crawford.anu.edu.au/people/academic/arianto-patunru). My thesis is about the impact of trade and investment policies to Indonesian firms. I help tutor some courses in The ANU.
